message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $170. I believe it will be highly valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but $170 is a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $100 for it.
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I appreciate your offer, but I can't go lower than $140. This product is high-quality and I believe it will bring you a lot of value.
I understand the product is high-quality, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $110 for it.
Bob, I'm trying to be flexible here. How about we meet in the middle at $125? That's my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $115 for it.
